text: haey trong chea anak del ban banhchoun khyal chea damnoengola muoy mounnung kdei me tda krounea robsa trong( tukaphlieng) mokadl . louhdl pel del khyal noh ban romkel dom popk da thngon( klaycha tukaphlieng) yeung kaban sraochasrap vea leu tambn kriemokraoh . haey yeung ban banhchouh tukaphlieng tamory vea( popk) banteabmk yeung ban b po chnh tamory vea( tukaphlieng) nouv phleanouphl krob braphet . dauchnaoh der yeung nung b po ch nh sakasap( thveu aoy rsa laengvinh now thngai barlok) daembi aoy puok anak changcham
